* BrightBlade yawned as she walked towards the bridge, a confused look on 
her face as she saw a miniature T-Rex fembot walk past.*

" Who in the Pit?"

* She shook her head and then looked back up the bridge and at Hell Beast, 
hearing a bit of the conversation between the two but not thinking much 
about it. All she knew was that that fem-reptile was in for the shock of her 
life if she thought she could overpower Hell Beast.
Of course, BrightBlade would never try such a stunt, she wanted to die in 
battle...not at the hands of her commander.
She herad Dremona tell the she-spider and Pheniox to drop in later and bring 
the rest of the fembots with them.
She narrowed her optics at that fact, this could prove to be useful but now 
was not the time. She had other plans, involving the Maximals.
BrightBlade walked up to the bridge and up to Hell Beast, if she had a plan 
then it was all his right to know about it. Besides, it was her time to 
report on events.
She kneeled down in front of her commander and bower her head, the actions 
meaning nothing more then COMPLETE respect and loyalty.*

" I have a bit of information on the Maximals and Alliance if you wish to 
hear, My Lord.
That croon, Zardus has kidnapped the fembots Tavatron and Iron Raptor. This 
two forces in which are now not a problem, held and captive. Which means 
that our own forces do not need to worry about that reptile transforming 
into that huge behemoth, thus, kicking our own skid-plates.
However, the Maximals are abandoning the Ark now and moving into an even 
bigger battle ship, a problem to the fullest."

* She then took in a deep breath, the information in which she had obtained 
about the new ship could prove useful. If she was permitted she would enter 
the new ship and scope out the weaponry, giving Hell Beast all of the 
information she found.*

" My Lord, the weapons on the new Maximals abode are extremely powerful and 
will create a problem for us. However, I have an idea. With you permission I 
will infiltrate the new ship and collect the information on the weaponry and 
bring back a full-scale diagram of every room and crawl space in that ship.
With my hacking skills and hot wiring ability I will be able to map every 
weak point in that ship and relay the information to you. A step towards 
defeating the Maximals at their own game.
But, of course, only with you permission...Lord."

* Then, on her knees she waited for her commander's reply.
Not sure of his reaction her spark sped up a bit, knowing that he didn't 
like failure and knowing that she was most likely to be punished if she did 
fail.
The thoughts of what he would do to her flashed behind her optics, wondering 
about which actions would be worse.
But she was loyal, she would continue to fight for Hell Beast if he even 
nearly killed her.
She was just that type of bot.
But then another thought creesed her mind: Where was Gangon?
She hadn't seen hide nor hair of him for the past few weeks, where could he 
be?
But she waited, listening carefully for her Lord's decision.*
